info.task: navigate forwards to collapsed select-only combobox
info.title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed select-only combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the Combobox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the Combobox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
